name: QRCode
author: kafeijao
description:
Read QRCodes with the CVR Camera. After scanned they show up in the little menu and you can click to interact with them (if you don't click, no action will be done).

- QRCodes for `Avatars`, `Props`, `Users`, `Worlds`, and `Instances` will open the corresponding details page in-game.
- URL QRCodes will open the url in your browser.
- All others will copy the text content of the QRCode into your clipboard.

If you want to test, search for the `QR Code Demo` Prop, it contains all types of QRCodes.

Check [README.md](https://github.com/kafeijao/Kafe_CVR_Mods/tree/master/QRCode) for more in-depth info (including how to make CVR Entities QRCodes).
